# Python native modules
import os
# Third party libs
from fastcore.all import *
import torch
from torch.nn import *
from fastcore.all import *
from fastai.learner import *
from fastai.torch_basics import *
from fastai.torch_core import *
from fastai.callback.all import *
# Local modules
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class SAC(Module):
    def __init__(self,s_in,a_out):
        self.layers=Sequential(
            Linear(s_in,100),
            ReLU(),
            Linear(100,a_out)
        )
    def forward(self,x): return self.layers(x)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class Discriminator(Module):
    def __init__(self,s_in,n_skills):
        self.layers=Sequential(
            Linear(s_in+n_skills,100),
            ReLU(),
            Linear(100,n_skills)
        )
    def forward(self,x): return self.layers(x)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
reward=1
state=torch.randn((1,4))
state_size=state.shape[1]
n_skills=4
skill_hot=torch.zeros((1,n_skills));skill_hot

tensor([[0., 0., 0., 0.]])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
current_skill=skill_hot.clone()
current_skill[:,2]=1;current_skill

tensor([[0., 0., 1., 0.]])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
discriminator=Discriminator(state_size,n_skills)
discriminator(torch.hstack((state,current_skill)))

tensor([[ 0.3513, -0.0741,  0.2270, -0.1992]], grad_fn=<AddmmBackward>)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sac=SAC(state_size+n_skills,2)
sac(torch.hstack((state,current_skill)))

tensor([[-0.2188,  0.1307]], grad_fn=<AddmmBackward>)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
intrinsic_reward=log_p_of_current_skill-log_p_all_skills
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sac.train(intrinsic_reward,...)
{% endraw %}
